mapper.select: SELECT A.SL_CODE AS slCode, A.HOUSE_CODE AS houseCode, A.PD_ID AS pdId, A.PD_CLASSES_CODE AS pdClassesCode, A.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode, A.PD_BREED_CODE AS pdBreedCode, A.PD_FEATURE_CODE AS pdFeatureCode FROM sl_house_product AS A where A.HOUSE_CODE=#{filterMap.houseCode} AND (A.DEL_FLG IS NULL OR A.DEL_FLG =0)

SELECT A.SL_AREA_ID AS slAreaId, A.SL_CODE AS slCode, A.HOUSE_CODE AS houseCode, A.LGCS_AREA_CODE AS lgcsAreaCode, A.PROVINCE_CODE AS provinceCode, A.CITY_CODE AS cityCode, A.DISTRICT_CODE AS districtCode, A.ADDRESS AS address FROM sl_house_area AS A where A.HOUSE_CODE=#{filterMap.houseCode} AND (A.DEL_FLG IS NULL OR A.DEL_FLG =0)

SELECT SL_CODE AS slCode, HOUSE_CODE AS houseCode, HOUSE_CATEGORY_CODE AS houseCategoryCode, HOUSE_RECLASSIFY_CODE AS houseReclassifyCode FROM sl_house_manage WHERE HOUSE_RECLASSIFY_CODE = #{filterMap.houseCategory} AND (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0) GROUP BY HOUSE_CODE
